games.guide:
How to install a Payday 3 mod

Step 1: Find where your Payday 3 game is installed and go to {Location}/PAYDAY3/Content/Paks/ .

Step 2: Create the "~mods" folder

Step 3: Open the launcher where you own the game and go to the launch options:

  • On Steam: Open the Payday 3 page, click the settings button, then Properties, and finally General (if Steam doesn’t take you there by default).
  • On Epic Games Store: Find the Payday 3 tile, right‑click it, and click "Manage"; the option will be at the bottom of the settings window.

Step 4: Enter "-fileopenlog" in the launch options.

And there you go, your game is ready to be modded! Just put your mods in the "~mods" folder you created earlier and launch the game.
games.name: Payday 3

mods.description: This mod uses Hioyami’s succubus fanart as the phone wallpaper.
mods.shortdescription: This mod uses Hioyami’s succubus fanart as the phone wallpaper.
mods.title: Phone Wallpaper - Sinder Succubus

mods.title: Gamersupps Vending Machine - Sinder

mods.shortdescription: This mod replaces the original van texture with a Sinder-based texture in a van racing style.
mods.title: Van livery - Sinder

mods.description:
This mod replaces multiple teams with fictional, vtuber‑themed teams.

The drivers are replaced as follows:
Max Verstappen -> Sinder (renamed "Sinder PUP")
Sergio Checo Pérez -> Trickywi (renamed "Trickywi Nouvelle NEPHASIS")
Yuki Tsunoda -> Yuzu Sanagi
Daniel Ricciardo -> Vienna (renamed "Vienna Noodle")
Charles Leclerc -> Aura GX
Carlos Sainz Jr. -> Kiri Kilovolt
Lewis Hamilton -> Mori Calliope
George Russell -> Cecilia Immergreen

And the teams as follow:
Oracle Red Bull Racing -> Gamersupps Pyro Pup Industries Formula 1 Team
Visa Cashapp RB F1 Team -> Demalyx Coschamps Racing
Mercedes-AMG Petronas Formula One Team -> [Sponsor TBD] Holopro Formula One Team
HP Scuderia Ferrari -> Opera Scuderia Ferrari
mods.shortdescription: This mod replaces multiple teams with fictional, vtuber‑themed teams.
mods.title: Vtuber F1 Teams

The affected trailers are: insulated, dry, curtain‑sided, refrigerated
